name: copy-import
description: Copies import code for file in explorer menu

copyImport.rootAlias.markdownDescription: An alias for your project root used for substitutions in import templates

copyImport.fileExtensionImportTemplateMa.markdownDescription:
A map of file extensions to their import template


Substition varialbes:


`{{EXT}}` `{{BASENAME}}` `{{PROJECT_ROOT}}` `{{FILE_PATH}}` `{{DOT_PATH}}` `{{ROOT_ALIAS}}`


Configuration example:

```
"copyImport.fileExtensionImportTemplateMap": {
	"js": "import {{BASENAME}} from '{{ROOT_ALIAS}}/{{FILE_PATH}}'",
	"py": "from {{DOT_PATH}} import {{BASENAME}}"
}
```
